snippet.title: Desecration short walkthrough (Apple II - Mind Games)
snippet.description:
Desecration was a graphics adventure and action game published by Mind Games in 1982 for the Apple ][. You are an assassin who was hired to go to planet Pykron 9 to take out its boss, Dunmark Pykro.

The adventure part was extremely confusing for me, as the game won't accept basic commands like North, or Go North. After many tries, I finally found out that I needed to use Forward, Back, Left, and Right for navigation. Hope you enjoy the short walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
